title: bitcasinorank
author: bitcasinorank
created_time: June 08, 2023, 08:24:05 PMLast edit: June 08, 2023, 09:15:10 PM by bitcasinorank
content: Greetings to all Crash Gamblers!I would like to present my new project Crashgambling.club. A place where we test and review Crash games and Crash Gambling sites.We plan to create an ultimate destination for all crash lovers with active community and share useful and interesting information. Currently the website live in its beta-version and we will release the new design and features in a couple of months, but to bring some value already I've created a this complete list of crash games:THE COMPLETE LIST OF CRASH GAMESIn this list you can find not only the list but various game's attributes like: RTPMin/Max BetMax PayoutDemoIf the game is Provably FairDo not hesitate to let me know if I miss something I indicate some info incorrectly.In future we plan develop few products for crash gamblers and I would like to hear if there is something you would like to see to assist your gambling process.We also active in social media where you can find crash games tests with real money, interesting big wins, and industry news. Consider joining if you find it interesting:BC.Game Crash Test on Reddit. Betfury Crash Test on Reddit. Telegram. Twitter. I will be glad to hear your feedback. Thanks everyone[/list]

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Welcome and hope you get the best possible suggestion as to how to go about your crash games development but then also one very important thing I will like to point out is that no one will be able to give you any feedback since your project is still in beta state and not live yet. So I will like to advise you to have a 100% developed and launched casino before you come here to seek feedback or suggestions so that members can have a real test of your games and thereafter offer their feedback or make suggestions.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: I welcome your new project to bitcointalk I do hope it gets completed successfully and with better innovations.I do agree with @Wiwo on the fact that it would have been better if you had completed the project and launched it before coming to the forum. After the launch you can still start a review campaign here in the forum and get people to test the site and give you legit feedbacks on how to develop the casino more.For now you can launch a review or a signature campaign all you can do at this point is to hope that forum do actually take their time to visit your site and tryout the beta version of the site.

comments.author: bitcasinorank
comments.body: Hey guys!Thanks for the comments.I am afraid you've misunderstood me:)My project isn't a crash game or crash website. It is the project ABOUT crash games and crash sites. And by products I meant products that could be useful for players and assist in their gambling sessions. We already working on a couple but I don't want to feature them too early and would like to hear is there anything that gamers need related to crash games.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: bitcasinorank on June 08, 2023, 08:48:19 PMHey guys!Thanks for the comments.I am afraid you've misunderstood me:)My project isn't a crash game or crash website. It is the project ABOUT crash games and crash sites. And by-products, I meant products that could be useful for players and assist in their gambling sessions. We already working on a couple but I don't want to feature them too early and would like to hear is there anything that gamers need related to crash games.Ok now I get your point, and the service you choose to offer to aid crash players winning their games in the form of games indicator and stimulators bots,  well that is also something that may not give accurate results at all times and can also lead to loses, Unless I don't still get it and you want to explain something further about what you mean by products

comments.author: bitcasinorank
comments.body: Oh, no not this. Nothing that will promise to win, just assist with game data tracking

comments.author: Johnyz
comments.body: Quote from: bitcasinorank on June 08, 2023, 09:00:28 PMOh, no not this. Nothing that will promise to win, just assist with game data trackingSo this could be an app that monitor the previous results and winnings from a crash game of a specific platform? Still wondering what’s the purpose of data tracking since it can’t still change your chances of winning on playing crash game. Anyway, just give some updates with regards to the development of this project and we might see this as interesting once its live already, if this is a free tracking app then it could be better.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: OP, to be frank your introduction looks poor and I do not see anything captivating about it. Joining other counterparts, I think it would be impossible to start a review on a beta version of your project when it is not guaranteed if it truly would see the light of the day. I can not review a site or project and at the entire end nothing is implemented or effected. Nobody would want to waste their time doing a review on project which is not yet launched.  It is more of you telling us you want our ideas to build your project but it would be better you make a launch first so that the inputs of members here would count if the case maybe because as it stands now it is assumed you are not serious to do anything and you acknowledging the reviews would be under probability. So no need to do that when the project in question is not yet launched.

comments.author: goldkingcoiner
comments.body: The concept is valid and I hope your project grows like you hope, but I do have to ask, why only crypto crash games? Are you planning on making any new additions soon? I bet the gamblers on this forum would love a massive live-updated statistics on the different games available on crypto casinos.How do you gather the current data? Are you simply adding new things to the list or are you using an automated process for the casino data collection? Also, are you partnered with any of the casinos or do you accept payment in exchange for good reviews? All this might sound a bit unnecessarily paranoid, but I have had bad experiences with rating/review websites. Remember ICOBench, where "ICO Experts" were paid for good reviews?

comments.author: Wexnident
comments.body: Quote from: bitcasinorank on June 08, 2023, 08:48:19 PMMy project isn't a crash game or crash website. It is the project ABOUT crash games and crash sites. And by products I meant products that could be useful for players and assist in their gambling sessions. We already working on a couple but I don't want to feature them too early and would like to hear is there anything that gamers need related to crash games.So something like a simulator maybe? Or ermmmm data tracking/summarizing of crash games across various sites? Wouldn't you require their APIs for that? Or are you planning to simply build your own using the algorithm they use (not really sure if that would completely match but eh)I don't really see how this can be useful to your average gambler especially if you consider how it's only limited to crash. Well I'd probably wait till you have at least a proper working site imo since your service relies on that more than anything else.

comments.author: kotajikikox
comments.body: Quote from: bitcasinorank on June 08, 2023, 08:24:05 PMGreetings to all Crash Gamblers!Hey , welcome to bitcointalk again and the project seems good to me about your plans to help gamblers specially crash players so hoping to see positive response to those who will try this one.QuoteWe also active in social media where you can find crash games tests with real money, interesting big wins, and industry news. Consider joining if you find it interesting:BC.Game Crash Test on Reddit. Betfury Crash Test on Reddit. Telegram. Twitter. I will be glad to hear your feedback. Thanks everyone[/list]Surely will follow your social media because I love crash games and seeking for some help in winning , maybe this is another opportunity to try with . Best of Luck .

comments.author: Nrcewker
comments.body: Why is your love towards crash games only? I get it that, crash is one of the popular game of the gambling industry, but why only crash game? You could have easily attracted more people if you would have covered all the games, all the varieties. The site looks good to be honest. So how does these reviews ranked here? Is this based on your preferences only? Moreover do you also do these paid reviews? Please let us know about this also OP.

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: Nrcewker on June 09, 2023, 03:06:30 AMWhy is your love towards crash games only? I get it that, crash is one of the popular game of the gambling industry, but why only crash game? You could have easily attracted more people if you would have covered all the games, all the varieties. The site looks good to be honest. So how does these reviews ranked here? Is this based on your preferences only? Moreover do you also do these paid reviews? Please let us know about this also OP.These days casino affiliates have good money if you can bring traffic on your website. Nothing matter as long as you can bring traffic. It's very clear that OP wants traffic on his website and a generic review site means your competition and difficulty is higher. So having a small niche is easier to do the job. A crash game niche seems easier to rank than preparing and producing contents for possible all games or slots of casino and casino related products.

Remember ICOBench, where "ICO Experts" were paid for good reviews?Thanks! Our resources are pretty limited currently, so we decided to choose one area and if it'll be sucesefull we will add other games as well like Dice, Plinko, etc. We will partner with casinos and developed automated process, o course:)No, we don't accept payment for good reviews, there are a lot of good brands to work with!Quote from: Wexnident on June 09, 2023, 12:19:21 AMQuote from: bitcasinorank on June 08, 2023, 08:48:19 PMMy project isn't a crash game or crash website. It is the project ABOUT crash games and crash sites. And by products I meant products that could be useful for players and assist in their gambling sessions. We will try to partner with brands to get this info, its a priority. This is only one of potential products and we will have something more interesting for casual players:)Quote from: BitcoinGirl.Club on June 09, 2023, 04:32:22 AMQuote from: Nrcewker on June 09, 2023, 03:06:30 AMWhy is your love towards crash games only? I get it that, crash is one of the popular game of the gambling industry, but why only crash game? Please let us know about this also OP.These days casino affiliates have good money if you can bring traffic on your website. Nothing matter as long as you can bring traffic. It's very clear that OP wants traffic on his website and a generic review site means your competition and difficulty is higher. So having a small niche is easier to do the job. A crash game niche seems easier to rank than preparing and producing contents for possible all games or slots of casino and casino related products.yes, because we have a small team and limited resources we can't cover all type of games currently, so we decided to choose the narrow topic. But we plan to expand in future and add other games as well (like plinko, dice, mines. etc.)

comments.author: AbuBhakar
comments.body: Welcome to the forum, You’ve got a nice list in there. It’s complete with the necessary information needed to know on the crash game. I want to suggest to separate the list for upcoming and unknown details so that it will not mixed to those crash games that is already working.Nice comparison on the RTP because that is a huge factor on playing crash especially for long term game. BTW how do you check the fairness of the crash games? Afaik some of the crash game in the list is came from provider with close source code.

comments.author: piebeyb
comments.body: It's not much different between Crash and Limbo, but I prefer to play Limbo, maybe I'd be happy to discuss other casino games like Limbo, but occasionally I often play Crash, maybe this site promotes and recommends some Crash games. It's also interesting to follow this. and wait for your website to finish. i will come again to see it.I also just tried the simulator game provided by your site using fake money, but unfortunately the page view loads 4 demo games at once so that it makes my browser so heavy to load it, besides that it doesn't include a link to load and try it in another tab to make it lighter, but I understand this is still in beta stage, nice to hear updates from you again later

And thanks for the suggestions, I've separated upcoming games that I couldn't find in any casino.Regarding the fairness, if there is statement that games isn't Provably Fair there is no way to check the fairness, I am afraid.Quote from: piebeyb on June 09, 2023, 11:51:25 AMIt's not much different between Crash and Limbo, but I prefer to play Limbo, maybe I'd be happy to discuss other casino games like Limbo, but occasionally I often play Crash, maybe this site promotes and recommends some Crash games. We plan to add more games as well, Limbo is totally on the list. Made a quick fix of a page with free demos, should work faster now;)

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Quote from: Wiwo on June 08, 2023, 08:53:08 PMQuote from: bitcasinorank on June 08, 2023, 08:48:19 PMHey guys!Thanks for the comments.I am afraid you've misunderstood me:)My project isn't a crash game or crash website. It is the project ABOUT crash games and crash sites. And by-products, I meant products that could be useful for players and assist in their gambling sessions. We already working on a couple but I don't want to feature them too early and would like to hear is there anything that gamers need related to crash games.Ok now I get your point, and the service you choose to offer to aid crash players winning their games in the form of games indicator and stimulators bots,  well that is also something that may not give accurate results at all times and can also lead to loses, Unless I don't still get it and you want to explain something further about what you mean by productsLolz, you still don't get it I believe, from what I understand, what the op is offering is just a review site, that is a platform where he posts (I think) his own personal reviews of crash games of different casinos respectively, the in-tricks am yet to fully understand right now, since I've not visited the site or seen any of the already posted reviews..But yeah, it's not a casino the op is building, neither is it a game simulator or indicator bot of any kind, it's a just a site to house his own opinions or experiences on crash games from different casinos.

comments.author: TimeTeller
comments.body: Quote from: piebeyb on June 09, 2023, 11:51:25 AMIt's not much different between Crash and Limbo, but I prefer to play Limbo, maybe I'd be happy to discuss other casino games like Limbo, but occasionally I often play Crash, maybe this site promotes and recommends some Crash games. It's also interesting to follow this. and wait for your website to finish. i will come again to see it.I also just tried the simulator game provided by your site using fake money, but unfortunately the page view loads 4 demo games at once so that it makes my browser so heavy to load it, besides that it doesn't include a link to load and try it in another tab to make it lighter, but I understand this is still in beta stage, nice to hear updates from you again later  Crash game is a good start to have this comparison table. Yes, if they can add other games, that would be very nice.But for the moment, they have a lot to review as the list is long. But the provably fair column alone is a very good info to the players.Because a simple question from this, do you really want to bet high amounts on a crash game which is not provably fair? I don't think so.Also, since the OP found a way to post this thread on the gambling board of the forum, can he also add a column where he can put the bitcointalk thread link of the site itself?This will give us idea if we can easily ask for help if anything goes wrong with our game. Because an active thread in this forum will give us a bit peace of mind that their team is reachable by forum players.

comments.author: BitTraderCute

I don't think so.Also, since the OP found a way to post this thread on the gambling board of the forum, can he also add a column where he can put the bitcointalk thread link of the site itself?This will give us idea if we can easily ask for help if anything goes wrong with our game. Because an active thread in this forum will give us a bit peace of mind that their team is reachable by forum players.It is true that betting high amounts in a crash game does not guarantee a profit for every player, but in this crash game we can see, carefully process the fixed prediction time to take advantage that we can take. And as much as possible, each player will continue to set the right strategy where we cash in the right bets so that we make a profit. And what we think is the main goal of avoiding cheating, or manipulation so that we don't experience losses, players will automatically manage their time, strategy and place bets at a certain time.
